subject: Olympic Games
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The United States women’s soccer team, the gold medalist in the 1996 and 2004 Olympics, was placed in Group G with Norway, Japan and New Zealand in the draw for the Olympic soccer tournament.
snippet: The United States women’s soccer team, the gold medalist in the 1996 and 2004 Olympics, was placed in Group G with Norway, Japan and New Zealand in the draw for the Olympic soccer tournament.
